articles.author: Anthony Izaguirre
articles.title: NYC mayoral candidates make final push ahead of Election Day - AP News
articles.description: New York City’s mayoral candidates are making a final push to get voters to the polls as the race to lead America’s biggest city nears its finale. Ahead of Election Day on Tuesday, Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani, former Gov. Andrew Cuomo and Republican Cur…
articles.content:
From Coney Island to the Bronx, the candidates in New York Citys mayoral race spent Monday crisscrossing the five boroughs in a final, frenzied day of campaigning on the eve of Election Day.
As cand… [+5578 chars]
